metadata.titleEn: An inventory of retrogressive thaw slumps along the vulnerable Qinghai-Tibet engineering corridor (2019)
metadata.titleCn: 青藏工程走廊沿线热融滑塌综合调查（2019）
metadata.description:
Retrogressive thaw slumps (RTSs) are slope failures caused by the thawing of ice-rich permafrost. Once developed, they usually retreat at high speeds (meters to tens of meters) towards the upslope direction, and the mudflow may destroy infrastructure and release carbon stored in frozen ground. RTSs are frequently distributed in permafrost areas and increase dramatically but lack investigation. Qinghai Tibet Engineering Corridor crosses the permafrost, links the inland and the Tibet. However, in this critical area, we lack knowledge of the distribution and impact of RTSs. To compile the first comprehensive inventory of RTSs, this study uses an iterative semi-automatic method based on deep learning and manual inspection to delineate RTSs in 2019 images. The images from PlanetScope CubeSat have a resolution of 3 meters, have four bands, cover a corridor area of approximately 54,000 square kilometers. The method combines the high efficiency and automation of deep learning and the reliability of the manual inspection to map the entire region ninth, which minimize the missings and misidentification. 
The manual inspection is based on geomorphic features and temporal changes (2016 to 2020) of RTSs. The inventory which includes 875 RTSs with their attributes, including identification, Longitude and Latitude, possibilities and time, provides a benchmark dataset for quantifying permafrost degradation and its impact.
metadata.descriptionCn: 热融滑塌是由于富冰多年冻土退化而导致的一种类似滑坡的热喀斯特地貌。一旦形成，它们会以较高的速度（几米至几十米每年）溯上坡方向扩张，垮塌的土壤和岩石会流向周边，对基础设施构成威胁，并可能释放冻土中的碳。已有研究表明，热融滑塌广泛地分布于多年冻土区，并且最近十多年它们的数量和影响范围显著增加。青藏工程走廊跨越多年冻土区，是连接内地与西藏的动脉，但已有研究对热融滑塌的分布和影响的认识还十分缺乏。为了对整个青藏工程走廊的热融滑塌进行详细和全面的调查，本研究使用深度学习方法以及目视解译和实地验证，识别并勾勒了2019 年该区域的热融滑塌。使用的高分辨率遥感影像是PlanetScope微小卫星影像，分辨率为 3 米，有4个波段，完全覆盖了整个工程走廊的多年冻土区（ 约54,000 平方公里）。该方法结合深度学习的高效性及自动化和人工解译的可靠性，对整个区域进行接近十次的迭代制图，最大程度地避免漏检和误检。目视解译根据其地貌特征和时间变化（2016至2020）检查深度学习算法自动勾绘的热融滑塌。结果中包含 875 个热融滑塌的边界，以及它们的一些属性，包括编号、经纬度、置信概率和时间等信息。该结果为研究青藏工程走廊多年冻土退化以及相应的影响提供了一个重要的基准数据集。
metadata.instructions: The vector file in geopackage / gpkg format contains the boundary of each hot melt collapse. Relevant attribute tables include number, confidence probability, time of satellite image, source of the satellite image, near roads labels, initial year, longitude and latitude, area (unit: m2), and depth learning model used. The corresponding names of the table fields are "Id", "probability", "year-month", "source image", "near road", "initial year", "longitude", "latitude", "area", "deep learning model". "Probability" represents our confidence in the described hot melt collapse, which is divided into "high", "medium" and "low". The file in GIF format shows the time change of each hot melt collapse (from 2016 to 2020), in which the file name format is "rts_id", "Id" corresponds to the vector file.
metadata.instructionsCn: geopackage/GPKG 格式的矢量文件包含每个热融滑塌的边界。相关的属性表包括编号、置信概率、卫星图像的时间、卫星图像的来源、 是否靠近道路、初始年份、经度和纬度、面积（单位：平方米）、使用的深度学习模型。 表字段的相应名称是“ID”、“Probability”、“Year-month”、“Source Image”、“near road”、“Initial year”、“Longitude”、“Latitude”、“Area”、“Deep Learning model”。 “Probability” 代表了我们对于所描绘的热融滑塌的确信程度，分为“High”、“Medium”、“Low”三个等级。GIF 格式的文件显示了每个热融滑塌的时间变化（从 2016 年到 2020 年），其中文件名格式为“RTS_ID”， “ID”和矢量文件对应。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many thermokarst landslides were identified and documented using deep learning and visual interpretation methods in the data collection process for the Tibetan Plateau region?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原地区的数据收集过程中，通过深度学习和视觉解读方法识别和记录了多少个热融土壤滑坡？

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the data collection method using deep learning and visual interpretation compare to traditional field surveys for identifying thermokarst features in permafrost regions?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用深度学习和视觉解读的数据收集方法与传统的实地调查在识别永久冻土地区的热融地貌特征方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The data collection method using deep learning and visual interpretation combines the efficiency and automation of deep learning with the reliability of manual interpretation. It enables iterative mapping to minimize omissions and errors, while traditional field surveys may provide more direct and detailed local observations but are typically more time-consuming and labor-intensive.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 使用深度学习和视觉解读的数据收集方法结合了深度学习的高效性和自动化以及人工解读的可靠性。它使得迭代映射成为可能，从而最小化遗漏和错误，而传统的实地调查虽然可以提供更直接和详细的地方观察，但通常更耗时且劳动密集。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of deep learning with visual interpretation and field verification enhance the accuracy and reliability of identifying thermokarst features in permafrost regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 深度学习与视觉解读和实地验证的结合如何提高在永久冻土地区识别热融地貌特征的准确性和可靠性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of deep learning with visual interpretation and field verification enhances accuracy and reliability by combining the efficiency and automation of deep learning with the reliability of manual interpretation. This method allows for iterative mapping to minimize both false negatives and positives by cross-verifying algorithm-drawn features with geomorphological characteristics and temporal changes observed in 2016 to 2020.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 深度学习与视觉解释和实地验证的结合，通过将深度学习的高效性和自动化与人工解释的可靠性相结合，提高了准确性和可靠性。这种方法允许进行迭代映射，以最小化假阴性和假阳性，通过与2016年至2020年观察到的地貌特征和时间变化进行交叉验证算法绘制的特征。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to integrate deep learning methods with visual interpretation for identifying thermokarst features in permafrost regions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 将深度学习方法与视觉解释相结合，以识别永久冻土地区的热融特征是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Integrating deep learning methods with visual interpretation is important because it combines the efficiency and automation of deep learning with the reliability of human expertise in visual analysis. This hybrid approach aims to maximize detection accuracy by iteratively mapping potential features, thus reducing false negatives and false positives in identifying thermokarst features along the Qinghai-Tibet engineering corridor. It ensures comprehensive mapping of thermokarst features, which are critical for understanding permafrost degradation and its impacts.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 将深度学习方法与视觉解释相结合是重要的，因为它将深度学习的高效性和自动化与人类在视觉分析中的可靠性结合在一起。这种混合方法旨在通过迭代映射潜在特征来最大化检测准确性，从而减少在识别青藏工程走廊沿线的热卡斯特特征时的假阴性和假阳性。它确保对热卡斯特特征进行全面映射，这对于理解永久冻土退化及其影响至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures can be implemented to ensure the reliability and accuracy of identifying and delineating thermokarst landslides using high-resolution remote sensing imagery, particularly when employing deep learning methods?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 可以实施哪些程序以确保使用高分辨率遥感影像识别和划定冻土塌陷滑坡的可靠性和准确性，特别是在采用深度学习方法时？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedures involve using high-resolution remote sensing imagery, such as the 3-meter resolution PlanetScope microsatellite images, to cover the entire permafrost region of the engineering corridor. A combination of deep learning methods for efficiency and automation, along with manual interpretation for reliability, is used. The process includes iteratively mapping the region approximately ten times to minimize false negatives and false positives. Additionally, visual interpretation is based on geomorphological features and temporal changes from 2016 to 2020 to verify the automatic delineation of thermokarst landslides by the deep learning algorithm.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该程序涉及使用高分辨率遥感影像，例如3米分辨率的PlanetScope微卫星影像，覆盖工程走廊的整个永久冻土区域。采用深度学习方法以提高效率和自动化，同时结合人工解读以确保可靠性。该过程包括大约十次迭代映射该区域，以最小化假阴性和假阳性。此外，基于2016年至2020年的地貌特征和时间变化进行视觉解读，以验证深度学习算法自动划定的热融土滑坡的准确性。
